column1: The Pit Room////Best BBQ in Houston
column2: in my opinion. I've been to several
column3: but this place is consistently the best. My favorite thing to get is the brisket tacos with tortilla chips. Everything I've tried is delicious
column4: though! Also highly recommend the macaroni and cheese & jalape√±o sausage! This is my go-to spot when people are in town and I want to take them somewhere GREAT!
